Available Positions:

Why Join TrueDigital?

At TrueDigital, we value innovation and teamwork. Our hiring process is simple: apply online, complete a short assessment, and interview with our team. Join us to power the digital future!

Network Administrator (NA001)

Job Description Responsible for managing and maintaining the company's network infrastructure to ensure optimal performance and security.
Salary Range $AUD60,000 - $AUD80,000 per year
Reports to IT Manager
Key Responsibilities
  1. Monitor and maintain network performance.
  2. Configure and manage network devices such as routers and switches.
  3. Troubleshoot network issues and outages.
  4. Implement network security measures.
Required Qualifications
  • Essential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
  • Essential: 3 years of experience in network administration.
  • Essential: Proficiency in TCP/IP, VLANs, and network protocols.
  • Preferable: CCNA or equivalent certification.
  • Preferable: Experience with firewall management.
Apply Now

Software Developer (SD002)

Job Description Design, develop, and maintain software applications to meet business needs.
Salary Range $AUD70,000 - $AUD90,000 per year
Reports to Development Team Lead
Key Responsibilities
  1. Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code.
  2. Collaborate with team members to design software solutions.
  3. Test and debug applications to ensure functionality.
  4. Participate in code reviews and provide feedback.
Required Qualifications
  • Essential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field.
  • Essential: 2 years of experience in software development.
  • Essential: Proficiency in programming languages such as Java, Python, or C#.
  • Preferable: Experience with agile development methodologies.
  • Preferable: Knowledge of database management systems.
Apply Now

Data Analyst (DA003)

Job Description Analyze and interpret complex data sets to provide actionable insights for decision-making.
Salary Range $AUD65,000 - $AUD85,000 per year
Reports to Data Science Manager
Key Responsibilities
  1. Collect and clean data from various sources.
  2. Perform statistical analysis and data visualization.
  3. Develop reports and dashboards to communicate findings.
  4. Collaborate with stakeholders to understand data needs.
Required Qualifications
  • Essential: Bachelor's degree in Statistics, Mathematics, or related field.
  • Essential: 2 years of experience in data analysis.
  • Essential: Proficiency in SQL and data visualization tools (e.g., Tableau).
  • Preferable: Experience with Python or R for data analysis.
  • Preferable: Strong communication skills.
Apply Now

Cybersecurity Specialist (CS004)

Job Description Protect the company's information systems from cyber threats and ensure data security.
Salary Range $AUD75,000 - $AUD95,000 per year
Reports to Chief Information Security Officer
Key Responsibilities
  1. Monitor security systems and respond to incidents.
  2. Conduct vulnerability assessments and penetration testing.
  3. Develop and implement security policies and procedures.
  4. Educate employees on cybersecurity best practices.
Required Qualifications
  • Essential: Bachelor's degree in Cybersecurity or related field.
  • Essential: 3 years of experience in cybersecurity.
  • Essential: Knowledge of security frameworks and compliance standards.
  • Preferable: CISSP or equivalent certification.
  • Preferable: Experience with SIEM tools.
Apply Now

IT Support Technician (IT005)

Job Description Provide technical support to employees and resolve IT-related issues.
Salary Range $AUD45,000 - $AUD60,000 per year
Reports to IT Support Manager
Key Responsibilities
  1. Respond to help desk tickets and provide timely resolutions.
  2. Install and configure hardware and software.
  3. Troubleshoot network and system issues.
  4. Maintain documentation of IT procedures and solutions.
Required Qualifications
  • Essential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology or related field.
  • Essential: 1 year of experience in IT support.
  • Essential: Strong problem-solving skills.
  • Preferable: CompTIA A+ certification.
  • Preferable: Experience with Windows and macOS operating systems.
Apply Now

Customer Service Representative (CS006)

Job Description Provide excellent customer service by addressing inquiries, resolving issues, and ensuring customer satisfaction.
Salary Range $AUD40,000 - $AUD55,000 per year
Reports to Customer Service Manager
Key Responsibilities
  1. Respond to customer inquiries via phone, email, or chat.
  2. Resolve customer complaints in a timely and professional manner.
  3. Maintain accurate records of customer interactions.
  4. Collaborate with other departments to address customer needs.
Required Qualifications
  • Essential: High school diploma or equivalent.
  • Essential: 1 year of experience in customer service.
  • Essential: Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
  • Preferable: Experience with CRM software.
  • Preferable: Multilingual abilities.
